abstract_summ: A novel coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) causing a cluster of respiratory infections (Coronavirus Disease 2019, COVID-19) first discovered in Wuhan, China is responsible for a new illness that has been found to affect the lungs and airways of patients with associated symptoms of fever, cough and shortness of breath . ECOWAS needs to make strategic plans based on available evidence to enable them effectively deal with this rapidly evolving pandemic .
